articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Historic Site Associated with Fatherland Liberation War
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Historic Site Associated with Fatherland Liberation War
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the Historic Site Associated with the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 He went round the supreme command post, the monument to the revolutionary activities, club of the General Staff and other places of the site.
					
					 He said that the supreme command post is impressively telling about the outstanding military idea and theory of President Kim Il Sung and his extraordinary military wisdom and outstanding commanding art.
					
					 Watching the holes punched by strafe on the wall of the office room used by the President and an unexploded bomb left stuck on a low hill near the supreme command post, Kim Jong Un noted that the President led the war to victory while staying in a very dangerous place, something unprecedented in the world history of wars.
					
					 The President fought open battles as he had to beat the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces externally and frustrate every move of the spies hired by the U.S. imperialists and anti-party factional elements to stamp out the Korean revolution with blood-shot eyes internally during the Fatherland Liberation War, he stressed.
					
					 In the operation room he said it is so simple and modest place that one can hardly call it an operation room used by the supreme commander of a country, adding that in the room the President honorably protected the destiny of the country and nation and brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for the U.S. imperialists.
					
					　 He went round with deep emotion the tunnel used by the President, the place where the President had a photo taken after receiving the title of DPRK Marshal and the place where he had a talk with DPRK heroes and exemplary combatants.
					
					　He looked round the newly built revolutionary museum.
					
					　Noting that the revolutionary museum was successfully built as required by the design approved by the Party, he praised the officials and scientists of the relevant field for displaying wisdom and enthusiasm in its construction.
					
					　He watched with keen interest the precious historical relics telling about leader Kim Jong Il who learned from the President's military idea, war methods and commanding art beside an operational table at the supreme command and went round with deep emotion the Samsok Primary School where Kim Jong Il studied with his far-reaching intention to carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					　He said the historical mementoes and materials in the site, which teach the truth that service personnel and people led by a great leader are sure to emerge victorious and show what an important role the leader plays in the revolutionary struggle, are all eternal treasures of the Korean revolution that can neither be written off nor be forgotten.
					
					 Underscoring the need to meticulously organize visits to the site among service personnel, people and youth so that they might resolutely protect and add eternal brilliance to the exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by leading the war to victory and steering the Songun (army-first) revolution, he set forth such tasks to be fulfilled to intensify education as to improve the qualifications of lecturers, take care of their work and living, briskly arrange itinerant lectures and produce video clips and picture albums on the site and widely disseminate them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae and Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Macedonian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Macedonian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Ilija Isajlovski, Macedonian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Railways Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Railways Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Railways headed by Minister Jon Kil Su returned home on Tuesday after taking part in the 43rd ministerial meeting of the Organization of Railways Cooperation held in Ulan Bator.

articles.title: Local Elections to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Local Elections to Be Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Elections for deputies to provincial (municipality), city (district) and county people's assemblies will take place in the DPRK on July 19, Juche 104 (2015) in accordance with Article 139 of the Socialist Constitution and decisions of the local people's committees.
					 The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly announced a report on the elections on Monday.

articles.title: Football Rhythmic Exercise Popular in DPRK
articles.content:
Football Rhythmic Exercise Popular in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Football rhythmic exercise has been recently created in the DPRK.
					Experts say it is helpful to football training and warming-up.
					
					The exercise is divided into three parts, which should be done to the tune of songs "Campfire", "It Is Offensive" and "Dash toward Future".
					
					In this regard, Kim Chol Ung, vice-principal of Pyongyang International Football School, told KCNA that the rhythmic exercise has been introduced in football training, proving effective.

articles.title: North-South Dialogue Cannot Become Political Plaything of Confrontation Maniacs: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
North-South Dialogue Cannot Become Political Plaything of Confrontation Maniacs: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet group let Jong Jong Uk, vice-chairman of the "preparatory committee for unification", a body ill-famed for escalating confrontation between social systems, "propose working-level contact", claiming that "if the north agrees on the proposal, the south would be able to do lots of things". The coteries of the Ministry of Unification are working with bloodshot eyes to shift the blame for the stalled dialogue on to the DPRK, shamelessly trumpeting about "north's refusal to hold dialogue" and "regret". The puppet group is kicking off more frantic moves against the DPRK in league with foreign forces, blustering that the group would "lead the north to dialogue through sanctions and pressure".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article terms it another shameless provocation against the DPRK under the pretext of "dialogue".
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean puppet forces may try to evade the blame for bedeviling the north-south relations while making profound confusing of right and wrong, they can never conceal their ugly colors as confrontation maniacs, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly concerned about dialogue and have elementary conscience, they should not take issue with the DPRK but look back on the catastrophic consequences brought about by their confrontation moves and apologize to the nation.
					
					 The puppet forces are not entitled to talk about dialogue any longer. North-south dialogue cannot become confrontation maniacs' political plaything under any circumstances.
					
					 They should not mislead public opinion but roll back the anachronistic and treacherous policy of confrontation and thus show the will for dialogue in practice.

articles.title: Cyber Space Is Not Monopoly of U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Cyber Space Is Not Monopoly of U.S.: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the U.S. made a failed attempt of "computer virus attack" on the DPRK's nuclear facilities five years ago. This fact has touched off great indignation at home and abroad.
					 Stuxnet used by the U.S. is known as the most fatal cyber attack means in history and a malignant virus that was used by the U.S. and Israel in destroying more than 1 000 centrifuges of the uranium enrichment establishment in Natanz, Iran in 2010.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says the recent disclosure of the U.S. cyber attack on the DPRK clearly proves how hell-bent the former is on neutralizing the latter's nuclear facilities with cyber terror.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is indeed the most vicious destroyer of the cyber space and the chieftain of the cyber terror in the world.
					
					 It now finds itself in an embarrassing situation, being unable to stifle the DPRK with the political, economic and military pressure and being at wit's end with the "human rights" campaign not offering any way-out. So, it is trying to attain its vicious goal at any cost even through the cyber terror.
					
					 The U.S. is greatly mistaken if it thinks the DPRK will just overlook with folded arms the provocations in the cyber space.
					
					 The cyber space is not the monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK can react to any forms of wars, operations and battles sought by the U.S. imperialists. It is the firm determination of the DPRK to wage Korean-style cyber war to hasten the final ruin of the U.S. and the forces following it, who attempted to bring down the former with the cyber war.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks against DPRK Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks against DPRK Censured
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, addressing a meeting on June 6, talked about "threat" and "abandonment of nuclear weapons", while slandering once again the DPRK's step for bolstering up the capabilities for self-defense. She was so impudent as to let loose a spate of rubbish that the north should opt for "dialogue and cooperation" and she hoped the north would take the "road of co-prosperity".
					 Commenting on this, papers here Tuesday term her remarks stinging outpourings reeking of extreme repugnancy and confrontation with follow countrymen.
					
					 The puppet chief executive's words and deeds over the past two years and her present-day acts indicate that she has regarded the DPRK as the target of confrontation and war, not as the fellow countrymen with whom to achieve reconciliation and unity, when approaching the north-south relations, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 No one in the world will regard the shells fired by the puppet forces almost every day in the hotspot areas in the West Sea and the areas along the Military Demarcation Line as fireworks for reconciliation because they are serious threats to the DPRK.
					
					 Park's rhetoric about "abandonment of nuclear weapons" is an open denial of the line and social system of the DPRK and a grave politically-motivated provocation against it. The DPRK's deterrence for self-defense with nuclear force as its pivot serves as the treasured sword guaranteeing the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the co-prosperity of the nation and it is not a bargaining chip which the DPRK can give up under pressure nor it is the one from which it hopes to get any reward.
					
					 Minju Joson says: Park is malignantly slandering the DPRK's line on simultaneously developing the two fronts and its step for bolstering up the capabilities for self-defense, a revelation of her sinister intention to realize her ambition for "unification through absorption" with the backing of the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Military Provocations against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Military Provocations against DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers staged the frantic joint anti-submarine operation drills in the sea off Jeju Island from May 30 to June 3 with many warships and U.S. naval sea-patrol planes involved, while trumpeting about "provocation and threat" from someone. And they staged a joint naval firing exercise of the three services of the puppet army in the East Sea of Korea.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says the moves of the puppet warmongers to do harm the DPRK by force of arms with the backing of foreign forces have gone beyond the danger line.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are now revealing their ugly colors as warmongers bereft of reason.
					
					 The north-south relations at present are very disastrous. Confrontation is getting so serious that it has become impossible to hold the joint national event for marking the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. Far from feeling guilty for the dangerous situation caused by their frantic confrontation moves, the puppet forces are working hard to ignite a war against the north in league with foreign forces, a blatant challenge to the Korean nation desirous of the improved north-south relations and the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The reality goes to fully prove that the "dialogue" touted by the puppet forces is nothing but a cynical ploy to shift the blame for the stalemate in the inter-Korean relations on to the DPRK and put spurs to the moves for igniting a war against it.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and the puppet group which scuppered the inter-Korean relations and harassed the peace on the Korean peninsula and in the region.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. Attempted Deployment of THAAD
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. Attempted Deployment of THAAD
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now scheming to deploy THAAD in the Eastern European countries and south Korea and are in the middle of negotiations with the countries of the Persian Gulf region over the sale of THAAD.
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. deployed 30 ABMs in Alaska State and California State and decided to additionally deploy 14 ABMs there by 2017 and set up update long-range identification radar in Alaska State by 2020.
					
					 The pretext cited by the U.S. in doing so is to defend the security of its mainland and its allies from the possible missile attacks from the DPRK and Iran.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says this is nothing but sophism for concealing the criminal attempt behind the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the U.S. sinister intention to make preemptive attacks on its major rivals including Russia and China in contingency by surrounding them with THAAD capable of neutralizing their strategic offensive weapons.
					
					 The Korean peninsula is turning to the dangerous theatre of the military confrontation between big powers as the U.S. considers the countries directly linked with the Korean peninsula as targets of preemptive strikes and is openly revealing its intention to stifle the DPRK by force.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up its war deterrent for self-defense in every way in order to ensure peace and stability on the Korean peninsula. It is foolish for the U.S. to dream of realizing its ambition to dominate the world at any cost by holding a military strategic edge.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Gibberish about "Dialogue" Condemned
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Gibberish about "Dialogue" Condemned
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group, upset by the statement issued by a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea disclosing the sinister intention of the group and clarifying the stand of the DPRK, expressed "regret" and talked such rubbish as the "stand of respecting all agreements made between the south and the north and looking into the ways of carrying them out" and "multi-faceted NGOs exchange".
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary terms it a deceptive rhetoric of die-hard colonial henchmen and confrontation maniacs who scuppered the north-south relations while seeking a war against the north and confrontation with fellow countrymen with the backing of their U.S. master.
					
					 It is self-evident that no agreements and implementation can be expected though the DPRK sits at the negotiating table more than one hundred times with pitiful colonial stooges of the U.S. who attach more importance to foreign forces than fellow countrymen.
					
					 The "regret" touted by the Park Geun Hye group is no more than a poor excuse to pass the buck to the DPRK for the inter-Korean relations collapsed owing to its treacherous crimes against national reunification.
					
					 If the Park group had truly wanted dialogue, it would not have perpetrated bad things cursed and condemned by all Koreans.
					
					 If it truly hopes for dialogue with fellow countrymen, it should have decency to sit at the negotiating table with the DPRK, to begin with.

articles.title: Deployment of THAAD and Introduction of Anthrax Germs under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deployment of THAAD and Introduction of Anthrax Germs under Fire in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on June 4 blasting the U.S. moves for deploying THAAD and its introduction of anthrax germs in south Korea.
					 The organization recalled that the U.S. secretly introduced the malignant anthrax germs into its air base in Osan, south Korea, not content with pressurizing the south Korean "government" to accept the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 It accused the U.S. of threatening the lives of the south Korean people, regarding south Korea as a theatre for tests of bio-chemical weapons.
					
					 It called for waging actions against the deployment of THAAD and the bio-chemical war in order to defend the lives of the people, ensure peace and reunify the country.

articles.title: Chongwadae Accused of Failing to Deal with Epidemic in South Korea
articles.content:
Chongwadae Accused of Failing to Deal with Epidemic in South Korea
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on June 6 censured in an editorial that an epidemic spreading across south Korea was the crisis caused by the incompetent "government".
					 The editorial blamed the Chongwadae for wasting its energy for unnecessary scramble though people are seized with horror of MERS.
					
					 The editorial accused Chongwadae of taking only fence-sitting attitude in the efforts to preventing the spread of the epidemic.
					
					 The present chief executive should come out to combat epidemic, it urged.

articles.title: Ceaseless Actions for Ousting S. Korean Puppet Regime Called for
articles.content:
Ceaseless Actions for Ousting S. Korean Puppet Regime Called for
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Representatives of south Korean civic and public organizations, including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy, held a rally outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul at which they declared they would carry on their actions for ousting the puppet regime, according to Saram Ilbo, an internet paper of south Korea, on June 7. 
					 Speakers recalled that Kang Hui Nam, first chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, committed suicide on June 6, 2009 in protest against the Lee Myung Bak group's treacherous and unpopular rule against reunification.
					
					 Cherished in the hearts of all people is the spiritual world of Kang who fought against subjugation and for independence with bitter resentment at the U.S forces and against dictatorship and oppression and for democracy, they said.
					
					 They noted that they would not halt the actions to oust the Park Geun Hye regime by inheriting the spirit of Kang.

articles.title: Suicide Cases Unabated in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Suicide Cases Unabated in S. Korean Puppet Army 
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- On April 5 a private soldier of a division of the puppet army on guard duty let a grenade go off in a suicide attempt, according to the south Korean KBS on June 2.
					 In other unit a soldier killed himself just 12 days after his posting.
					
					 Cruel disciplinary action, merciless violence, intolerable accusation and other human rights abuses are main causes of suicides, deaths and even cases in which soldiers shoot their friends and superiors to death are occurring in south Korea.

articles.title: MERS Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
MERS Spreads in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The number of those infected with MERS has reached 87 as of June 8 in south Korea, according to south Korean MBC.
					 It was reported that dozens of the cases were additionally confirmed to be infected due to contacts with medical institutions including hospitals.
					
					 The spread of the epidemic caused such mayhem that more than 1 160 kindergartens, primary, secondary and high schools and universities were compelled to close their classes as of June 4.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported Abroad
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Public organizations in Romania and Iran released statements on June 1 and 2 to mark the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania said:
					
					 There took place a north-south summit in Pyongyang in June 2000, at which the historic June 15 joint declaration was published to achieve Korea's reunification. 
					
					 The fundamental spirit of the joint declaration is to reunify the country independently and peacefully by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 Korea's reunification has not yet been realized due to the U.S. policy of aggression to dominate the Asia-Pacific and the moves of the south Korean authorities blindly following it.
					
					 The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea as soon as possible and the south Korean authorities should respect and implement the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					
					 The Iranian Workers' House said the validity and vitality of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, great programme for Korea's reunification, have been fully proved. Reaffirming full support for the joint declaration, the organization demanded the south Korean authorities immediately stop the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: DR Congo Political Party Supports WPK
articles.content:
DR Congo Political Party Supports WPK
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of DR Congo issued a statement on June 2 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement noted:
					
					 The Korean people are celebrating the 51st anniversary of his start of work at the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 He glorified the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as the guiding idea in the era of independence through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He thoroughly embodied the Juche idea in the revolution and construction and devoted his whole life to the happiness of the Korean people and the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un has enforced the politics of loving the people, true to the intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Workers' Party of DR Congo is pleased over the great successes made by the WPK in its struggle for building the people's paradise.
					
					 We will always stand by the WPK in the struggle for global independence.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in DR Congo
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of DP Congo led by General Secretary Boswa Isekombe Sylvere and Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of DR Congo, visited the DPRK embassy in the country on May 27 and June 1 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They paid tribute to the full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general secretary of the Communist Party of DR Congo said:
					
					 The WPK's development into an invincible party would be unthinkable without the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Only the WPK has been imbued with one idea and rallied close around the leader in single-minded unity.
					
					 Bright is the future of Korea as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK to Be Marked in Slovenia
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK to Be Marked in Slovenia
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation was formed in Maribor City on June 2.
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to widely introduce the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il through media and organize colorful political and cultural events in the capital city and local areas from June 2 to October 15.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Guinea
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea was formed on June 3.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize seminar, lecture, photo exhibition, film show and other political and cultural events praising the revolutionary life and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il from June 3 to October 12.

articles.title: Guinean People Laud Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Guinean People Laud Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the liberation of Korea took place on June 3.
					 At the ceremony Guinean personages paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who performed undying exploits for the founding and development of the WPK. 
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association in their speeches praised the President for authoring the Juche idea in his early years and victoriously leading the anti-Japanese armed struggle to achieve the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					
					 They added it was unthinkable without the wise leadership of the President and Kim Jong Il that the WPK emerged as a dignified party that has taken its roots deep among the popular masses and enjoy absolute support and trust from them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on June 3.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), says that in order to successfully accomplish the socialist cause it is important to hold fast to the ideological work and give priority to it in all matters.
					
					 It also clarifies the ideas that the basic task of the ideological work is to dye the whole society with the socialist idea and that the ideological work should be conducted according to the principles and methods suited to the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Lugar de Interes Historico-Revolucionario de Guerra de Liberacion de Patria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Lugar de Interes Historico-Revolucionario de Guerra de Liberacion de Patria
						
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Lugar de Interes Historico-Revolucionario de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Dio vuelta por el puesto de mando de la Comandancia Suprema, la lapida a la actividad historico-revolucionaria, el Club del Estado Mayor General y otros puntos.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que el puesto de mando transmite con gran emocion la destacada idea y teoria militares, la extraordinaria clarividencia militar y el aprobado arte de direccion militar del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Viendo la pared de la oficina usada por el Presidente por donde paso la bala de ametralladora, y la bomba sin estallar en la colina situada a poca distancia del puesto de mando, subrayo que en este mundo no hay otro lider como el Presidente quien condujo a la victoria la guerra estando en un lugar tan peligroso.
					
					Recordo que durante la pasada guerra coreana, el Presidente debia pasar la guerra sin secretos rechazando a las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas encabezadas por el imperialismo norteamericano, por una parte y por la otra, frustrando paso a paso las conspiraciones de los espias mercenarios del imperialismo norteamericano y los elementos fraccionalistas y antipartidistas enloquecidos por exterminar la revolucion coreana.
					
					Al entrar en la sala de operacion, dijo que en ese lugar tan sencillo y modesto para el comandante supremo de un pais, el Presidente defendio honrosamente el destino de la patria y la nacion y abrio el camino por la decadencia del imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					Recorrio con gran emocion la galeria usada por el Presidente, el sitio donde el tomo una foto de recuerdo tras recibir el titulo de Mariscal de la RPDC, el lugar donde el converso con los heroes de la Republica y los combatientes ejemplares, etc.
					
					Luego, el Mariscal paso revista al Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria recien construido.
					
					Aprecio los meritos de los funcionarios y los cientificos de la rama que dedicaron todas sus inteligencias y pasion para acondicionarlo excelentemente segun la demanda del diseno firmado por el partido.
					
					Vio con atencion los preciosos objetivos historicos que muestran que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il aprendio al lado de la mesa operacional la idea militar, metodos de combate y arte de direccion militar del Presidente, y recorrio la Escuela Primaria de Samsok donde el Dirigente estudio con el gran proposito de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Enfatizo que son indelebles e inolvidables patrimonios de la revolucion coreana los materiales y datos historicos conservados en el Museo que ensenan que triunfaran sin falta el ejercito y el pueblo guiados por el gran lider y que es muy importante el papel del lider en la lucha revolucionaria.
					
					Puntualizo que se debe organizar con escrupulosidad la visita a este lugar de interes historico-revolucionario para que los militares, habitantes y jovenes defiendan, mantengan y glorifiquen generacion tras generacion las inmortales hazanas del Presidente realizadas por la victoria de la guerra y de la revolucion del Songun. Presento las tareas para intensificar la educacion tales como elevar el nivel de los conferenciantes y cuidar bien el trabajo y la vida de ellos, dinamizar las conferencias ambulantes, divulgar ampliamente el multimedia y album sobre este lugar de interes historico-revolucionario, etc.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador de Macedonia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador de Macedonia 
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- Ilija Isajlobski presento el dia 9 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Macedonia en la RPDC.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Cristianos coreanos denuncian enmienda de "guia de cooperacion en defensa EE.UU.-Japon"
articles.content:
Cristianos coreanos denuncian enmienda de "guia de cooperacion en defensa EE.UU.-Japon"
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- El Comite Central de la Federacion de Cristianos de Corea y el "Consejo de Iglesia Cristiana del Sur de Corea" hicieron publica el dia 8 una declaracion conjunta de denuncia a las maniobras de Estados Unidos y Japon que amenazan la paz de la Peninsula Coreana,  Asia Oriental y el resto del mundo.
					El pasado dia 29 de abril, el presidente norteamericano Obama y el premier japones Abe sostuvieron conversaciones en la Casa Blanca, ocasion en la cual acordaron la enmienda de la "guia de cooperacion en defensa EE.UU.-Japon", segun la cual las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon toman todo el mundo como escena de operacion. Por ultimo, EE.UU. decidio apoyar el avance de Japon como pais miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Asi recuerda la nota y denuncia el hecho como insulto a la nacion coreana que sufrio bajo la ocupacion del imperialismo japones.
					
					Si EE.UU. tolera el desembarco de Japon en la Peninsula Coreana en el tiempo de emergencia a base de ese proyecto de enmienda, la reunificacion pacifica de la Peninsula Coreana sera mas dificil y en ambas partes coreanas se mantendra el estado extremadamente inestable, subraya.
					
					Y el presente estrechamiento de las cooperaciones de defensa EE.UU-Japon anulara la politica de la "defensa exclusiva" de Japon y, a su vez, causara la severa carrera armamentista en toda la extension de Asia Oriental inclusive en la Peninsula Coreana y agravara la tension militar en toda la region y el mundo, recalca y aclara las siguientes posiciones:
					
					Primero, anulad de inmediato el acuerdo de enmienda de la "guia de cooperacion en defensa EE.UU.-Japon" que amenaza la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					Segundo, que el gobierno de EE.UU. abandone su ambicion de hegemonia militar en el mundo y la cambie en la diplomacia pacifica de dialogo y la cooperacion.
					
					Tercero, que el gobierno de Japon pida disculpa ante el mundo por sus crimenes de guerra, mantenga la constitucion de la paz y cese su avaricia de conversion de su pais en la potencia militar.
					
					Cuarto, para salvaguardar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, Asia Oriental y el resto del mundo, los cristianos del Norte y el Sur de Corea oraran y actuaran solidarizandose con la iglesia del mundo y la conciencia del mundo entero aspirante a la paz.

articles.title: Se realizaran en RPDC elecciones de diputados a AP de provincias, ciudades y distritos
articles.content:
Se realizaran en RPDC elecciones de diputados a AP de provincias, ciudades y distritos
						
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 8 una informacion sobre la realizacion de las elecciones de los diputados a las Asambleas Populares de las provincias (las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro), las ciudades (los municipios) y los distritos.
					Segun la nota, acorde al articulo 139 de la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC y las resoluciones de los comites populares locales, las elecciones tendran lugar el 19 de julio del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche.
